# [Tool Name] Cheatsheet

Quick reference guide for [Tool Name].

## Installation

=== "macOS"

    ```bash
    brew install tool-name
    ```

=== "Linux"

    ```bash
    apt install tool-name
    # or
    yum install tool-name
    ```

=== "Windows"

    ```powershell
    choco install tool-name
    # or
    winget install tool-name
    ```

## Basic Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `tool command1` | What it does |
| `tool command2` | What it does |
| `tool command3` | What it does |

## Common Flags

| Flag | Long Form | Description |
|------|-----------|-------------|
| `-v` | `--verbose` | Verbose output |
| `-h` | `--help` | Show help |
| `-q` | `--quiet` | Quiet mode |

## Common Use Cases

### Use Case 1: [Description]

```bash
tool command --flag value
```

### Use Case 2: [Description]

```bash
tool command \
  --flag1 value1 \
  --flag2 value2
```

### Use Case 3: [Description]

```bash
tool command input output
```

## Examples

### Example 1: [Task]

```bash
# Step 1
tool step1

# Step 2
tool step2

# Verify
tool verify
```

### Example 2: [Task]

```bash
# Complete workflow
tool workflow --all
```

## Configuration

### Config File Location

- macOS/Linux: `~/.config/tool/config.yaml`
- Windows: `%APPDATA%\tool\config.yaml`

### Example Configuration

```yaml
setting1: value1
setting2: value2
nested:
  option1: value
  option2: value
```

## Keyboard Shortcuts

| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| ++ctrl+c++ | Cancel operation |
| ++ctrl+d++ | Exit |
| ++tab++ | Autocomplete |
